property.name: FULL_SCREEN
property.shortdesc: Fills the screen with the page; hides the toolbar, command bar, menu bar, and window controls.

property.name: ZOOM_IN
property.shortdesc: Magnifies the view to the next preset percentage.

property.name: ZOOM_OUT
property.shortdesc: Reduces the view to the previous preset percentage.

property.name: FIT_PAGE
property.shortdesc: Fits the entire page in the window.

property.name: FIT_WIDTH
property.shortdesc: Fits the page to the width of the window; may obscure the lower portion of the page.

property.name: FIT_VISIBLE
property.shortdesc: Fits the the text area of the page to the window width; obscures page margins and may obscure the lower portion of the page.

property.name: SINGLE_PAGE
property.shortdesc: Displays one page in the document pane at a time.

property.name: ONE_COLUMN
property.shortdesc: Arranges the pages in a continuous vertical column that is one page wide.

property.name: TWO_COLUMN
property.shortdesc: Arranges the pages side by side in a continuous vertical column that is two pages wide.
